titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Captain Charles Sealy, Senior Marine Officer in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: In this letter Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, refers to a previous communication from Captain Henry Hardy, which instructed officers in command of Company cruisers to conduct searches for slaves on board vessels bound from India to the Gulf. Stannus conveys instructions from the Honourable Governor in Council, which state that the utmost care should be taken in the performance of this duty in order to prevent any unnecessary delays for ships or boats that have not been implicated in this offence.
